content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)

### Copper plate factory
No copper plate factory exists

### Lab
Consists of a lab at position(x= unknown) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 67}

### Iron plate factory
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner equipment but being out of fuel
-  Ensure burner equipment has sufficient fuel before using it
### Errors when using furnace but having no ingredients to smelt
-  Ensure furnace has sufficient ingredients to smelt before using it
### Errors when using steam engine but having no input liquid
-  Ensure steam engine has sufficient input liquid before using it
### Errors when using offshore pump but having no fluid present in connections
-  Ensure offshore pump has sufficient fluid present in connections before using it
### Errors when placing entities but having insufficient inventory
-  Ensure you have sufficient items in your inventory before attempting to place entities
### Errors when using inserter but having no source items
-  Ensure inserter has source items before using it
